courseSpec.title: Introduction to TypeScript
courseSpec.audience: JavaScript developers wanting to learn TypeScript
courseSpec.goal: Master TypeScript fundamentals and apply them to real-world projects
courseSpec.teachingStyle: Practical and example-driven with hands-on exercises

lessonMeta.title: Type Annotations and Inference
lessonMeta.objective: Understand how to use type annotations and leverage TypeScript's type inference

feedback: Add more practical examples and explain when to use explicit annotations vs inference
